channel.title: ** Runserver.Bat., and Compiler Help **
channel.description:
Okay, I have jdk, (My compilers works) But I don't think it works correctly. Everytime I compile. About 6-7 seconds later. I get this - [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/n98c2.jpg[/img]
Does that mean I compiled it correctly. Earlier it said it had 1 error. But I fixed it. And I KNOW I have jdk.
Okay, now for the run part. I can't get it to work. And I have jre. In my program files. In a folder called 'Java'. And I'm pretty sure that's correct? Okay, this is what it looks like.
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/99i0ly.jpg[/img]
This is what is inside the bat file. Should I change to anything?
[code] @echo off color 0a Title DemolishScapeV3 java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-6.0.14-ga-bin.jar server pause [/code]
[b]I do have Jdk and Jre, Version 6 Update 14. (Stated in runserver.bat code)[/b]
Please, I need help. I've bean waiting for about a week to get my server up. And this is the only thing I need to fix!

item.title: ** Runserver.Bat., and Compiler Help **
item.dc:creator: @mathew000000000 mathew000000000
item.description:
@mathew000000000 wrote:

the compiler means it compiled correctly now for your run.bat

try this this is mine works for me but i have jdk6u7

@echo off color 81 title Glidzscape java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Read full topic

item.title: ** Runserver.Bat., and Compiler Help **
item.dc:creator: @n00bf0rlyf3 n00bf0rlyf3
item.description:
@n00bf0rlyf3 wrote:

@echo off
java -Xmx800M server
pause

Thats my runserver.bat

Read full topic

item.description:
@xxDiluted2xx wrote:

Ikoedlalampara:

hmm delete pause wat happens?

It exits out before you can put your eyes on it. Like runs, then goes away really fast.

Read full topic

item.title: ** Runserver.Bat., and Compiler Help **
item.dc:creator: @xxDiluted2xx xxDiluted2xx
item.description:
@xxDiluted2xx wrote:

[quote=“Ikoedlalampara, post:2, topic:284478”]
To answer this:
no. all compilers do that its normal it means its ok no errors


ok thats your runner may i suggest me editing this for you. go here:
http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?ghhlgznnzm2
for the new runserver.bat[/quote]

I even added ‘Pause’ to the bottom of the run text you gave me. And it still does the same thing. :o

Read full topic

item.title: ** Runserver.Bat., and Compiler Help **
item.dc:creator: @xxDiluted2xx xxDiluted2xx
item.description:
@xxDiluted2xx wrote:

Okay, I have jdk, (My compilers works) But I don’t think it works correctly. Everytime I compile. About 6-7 seconds later. I get this -

Does that mean I compiled it correctly. Earlier it said it had 1 error. But I fixed it. And I KNOW I have jdk.

Okay, now for the run part. I can’t get it to work. And I have jre. In my program files. In a folder called ‘Java’. And I’m pretty sure that’s correct? Okay, this is what it looks like.

This is what is inside the bat file. Should I change to anything?

@echo off
color 0a
Title DemolishScapeV3
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-6.0.14-ga-bin.jar server
pause

I do have Jdk and Jre, Version 6 Update 14. (Stated in runserver.bat code)

Please, I need help. I’ve bean waiting for about a week to get my server up. And this is the only thing I need to fix!

Read full topic
